aspguidp.service.core.asp.impl

Class DlvAspSolverService

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.service.core.asp.impl.DlvAspSolverService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AspSolverService

    public class DlvAspSolverService
extends java.lang.Object
implements AspSolverService
    Implementation of the AspSolverService interface which implements the execution of the dlv logic program solver.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DlvAspSolverService(java.lang.String logicProgramPath)
      Create a new solver service instance for the logic program which can be accessed in the program resources with the given path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DlvAspSolverService

        public DlvAspSolverService(java.lang.String logicProgramPath)
        Create a new solver service instance for the logic program which can be accessed in the program resources with the given path.
        Parameters:
        logicProgramPath - path of the logic program which is managed by the created solver service instance

    • Method Detail

      • executeLogicProgram

        public void executeLogicProgram(java.util.Collection<Atom> atoms,
                                SolverMessageManager solverMessageManager,
                                AnswerSetManager answerSetManager)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Execute the logic program which is managed by the answer set programming solver service instance. Pass the given logic atoms to the logic program as input and store the output of the logic program solver to the given solver message handler and the given answer set manager.
        Specified by:
        executeLogicProgram in interface AspSolverService
        Parameters:
        atoms - logic atoms which are passed to the logic program as input
        solverMessageManager - solver message manager to which the output of the logic program solver is forwarded
        answerSetManager - answer set manager to which the output of the logic program solver is forwarded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getLogicProgramContent

        public java.lang.String getLogicProgramContent()
        Specified by:
        getLogicProgramContent in interface AspSolverService
        Returns:
        content of the logic program which is managed by the answer set programming solver service instance
